extendedInfo.description: Armour yourself with range of Antonyms we are providing through this wonderful app. These set of Antonyms are presented to you with easy to use interface. We provide unique interface for quick selection of words and antonyms (A-Z). Bookmark you favourite words with antonyms for future reference.**** We have provided 2000+ unique words and sentences to enrich your knowledge. ****â Review (Read)Go through the Read section of the app and master the art of antonyms. This section would help you prepare for Match and Spellings sections of the app.â MatchYou will be presented with 4 words at a time on a single slide to match with right antonyms. You can simply swipe thru the complete list. You will be analysed based on speed and accuracy at which you finish this section.â SpellingsOnce you feel you are ready to spell each word that is part of the list, go and challenge yourself. Your performance in this section is also analysed.â AnalysisOne of a kind comprehensive analysis of your app usage is provided in this section. Through graph you can appreciate your progress and learning curve.â Store â In-App PurchaseApp provides you sample list of words. To get more you can select the list you want to purchase and enjoy the one of the most complete list of words with matching synonyms.â SettingsYou can set you email ID and password to receive your progress at a regular interval. This would help you track your English language skill development.

reviews.title: Awesome App For Learning English Words & Antonyms
reviews.comment: Improve English With Antonyms is a great app to learn thousands of English words and their Antonyms. The App also gives example sentences to get a better understanding of the words and antonyms.  Thank you for developing this simple yet exciting App.  AWESOME!!!!!
reviews.author: Parth Dalal

reviews.title: Offline
reviews.comment: I don\'t like the app unless it worked offline mode. I cannot use it when I am in the bus without internet
reviews.author: ceroandone

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Dint really start. Have to login and do some stupid thing
reviews.author: Aakash K
